Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Cancer Prevention (CPWG) Working Group including the current Chair of CPWG  Dr. Adriana Albini. The 2023 CPWG Town Hall willl be dedicated to the memory of Michael B. Sporn and will feature a three scientific presentations centered around the topic of Biomarkers and Early Detection Tests for cancer prevention. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM03. Biomarkers and Early Detection Tests for Cancer Prevention: A Cancer Prevention Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
Title: Biomarkers and Early Detection Tests for Cancer Prevention: A Cancer Prevention Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
